text: Hontōni izen yūsufu ga meishō o motarashita toki mo, kare ga motarashita mono ni tsuite, anata gata wa utagai o daite yamanakatta. Kare ga shinda toki ni natte, anata gata wa,“kare no nochi ni arrā wa, shito o tsukawasa renaideshou. ” To itta. Ko no yō ni arrā wa, muhōmono to kaigi-sha o, mayou ni makase rareru
